mapper.sql: id, user_id, uid, event, topic_id, reply_id, comment_id, context
mapper.select: select m.id as id,m.user_id as userId,m.uid as uid,m.event as event,m.topic_id as topicId, m.reply_id as replyId,m.comment_id as commentId,m.context as context,m.create_time as createTime, m.people_id as peopleId ,r.topic_id as rTopicId,r.context as rContext,t.title as tTitle, (select username from user where user.id=m.user_id) as username,(select username from user where user.id=m.uid) as uname,(select username from user where user.id=m.people_id) as peoplename,m.master_id as masterId,(select username from user where user.id=m.master_id) as mastername,(select head from user where user.id=m.user_id) as head from message as m LEFT JOIN reply as r on m.reply_id=r.id LEFT JOIN topic as t on t.id=m.topic_id where m.logic_delete_flag=0 and (m.uid=#{userid} or m.people_id=#{userid} or m.master_id=#{userid}) and m.user_id <> #{userid} ORDER BY m.create_time desc limit #{index},30
select count(*) from message where (uid=#{userid} or people_id=#{userid} or master_id=#{userid}) and user_id <> #{userid}
